attributes.additional_details:
Amend the 1920 Census Act to make the publication of the census data exempt from the 100 year rule such that the data can be published now.

It is already 90 years since that 1921 census.  the 1931 census data for England was destroyed and no census took place in 1941.

This is invaluable data and for many researchers release in 2021 will be too late.
